snippet.title: News Tower - Official Reveal Trailer (Coming to Steam Soon)
snippet.description:
News Tower - Official Reveal Trailer ( News Tower Coming to Steam Soon)

Wishlist News Tower on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...
Join our News Tower Discord server: https://discord.gg/zXxhFVpnYF
Play News Tower Alpha Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv4E7C9vcxyJGNTmv57-qGA?sub_confirmation=1

FOLLOW STUDIO NUL GAMES
Website: https://studionul.games/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/studionulgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/studionul.games/
Discord: https://discord.gg/zXxhFVpnYF
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1649950/News_Tower/

ABOUT NEWS TOWER

Build your own News Empire.

News Tower is a single player management simulation game coming to Steam Early Access summer 2021. It’s your aim to become the nation’s most trusted newspaper and build an economically profitable and independent newspaper empire.

News Tower takes place during the 1930s depression in the USA. The biggest economic downturn in history and another World War are imminent. Newspapers throughout the country are struggling as many of their customers need to cut their expenses. 

As chief editor of News Tower you manage every aspect of your building: from printer to toilet. Hire new employees, discover the globe to find the latest scoops, search for advertising deals, keep track of readers’ needs, manage your journals’ content and grow your newspaper empire by adding floors to your tower and create the optimal workplace for your reporters.

In a time when the media’s trustworthiness is often questioned due to fake news, ‘News Tower’ offers the opportunity to take on the role as chief editor and make your own considerations. Do you prefer advertisements over news coverage? Are you going for facts or “alternative” facts? It’s all up to you. Wishlist ‘News Tower’ on Steam now!

ABOUT STUDIO NUL GAMES
Studio Nul Games is a young video game company from Rotterdam, The Netherlands. Founded in 2019. We love making games that are smart, welcoming and immersive. Everyone in the Studio Nul Games team shares the same ambition; Having a good time through friendly gaming experiences that will test your skills and let you forget about anything else.

#StudioNulGames #NewsTower #SimulationGame #ManagementGame #Games #Game #Steam #SinglePlayer #Simulation
